text:
Hello everyone!
I’m *Aksh Kaushik*, and I’ve been exploring the *gfpop* package and reading about the work on *time-dependent constraints* for constrained changepoint detection. I’m really interested in this direction and am currently spending time understanding the framework, algorithms, and existing code.

I wanted to ask if there are any *small tasks or contributions* (e.g., documentation, tests, visualizations, or minor code improvements) that would be helpful for the project and suitable for someone getting deeper into gfpop, with the longer-term goal of working on time-dependent constraints.

Any guidance on good starting points would be greatly appreciated.
Thanks, and I’m excited to learn and contribute!
